company_projects.title: Workplace Monitoring System
descriptions: Developed a workplace monitoring system which multiprocesses 100 CCTV Cameras Simultaneously
It can detect PPE Kit, Slip and Fall, Smoke and Fire, Person Reidentification using Pytorch with 93-98% Accuracy
Wrote the inference script with Nvidia Tritron and deployed it using Docker and FastAPI

company_projects.title: 3D Body Measurement
descriptions: Led a team to implement research papers to calculate Body Mesurements with 97% Accuracy
Designed the system using Pytorch, Pytoch3D, FlaskAPI and React to to take one RGB image get measurements from it
Deployed the system on client's AWS machine

company_projects.title: Other Projects
descriptions: Developed a Model for detecting brick quality with 98% accuracy and deployed it to the client's (General Shale) system
Led a multidisciplinary team of Fullstack Engineers, AI Engineers and Annotators to develop a system for analyzing cricket videos to aid players in identifying and rectifying their errors
Created multiple models from scratch to key metrics such as batsman's body angles, ball speed, pitch map, bounce, and deflection points and classifying different shots

personal_projects.title: Medical Imaging
descriptions: can track Players and Ball and Seggragate different teams using YOLOV7 and KNN
Measure Player Speed and distance on moving camera using OpenCV
Calculate Ball Control of different teams

personal_projects.title: Football Analysis
descriptions: Developed a system that can track Players and Ball Seggragate different teams using Pytorch, YOLO, KNN
Measure Player Speed with moving camera using Perspective Tranform Algorithm
The system can measure how active the player has been and calculate Ball Control of different teams during the Game Using Opencv, Pytorch and classical Machine Learning Model
